channel.title: RuneEvolution - Loading 474
channel.description:
[center][b][img]http://runeevolution.com/images/banner.jpg[/img]
Base: Project Insanity - Normal PI - All Dupes fixed Client: RuneXero Client
[img]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/NighelRSPS]Youtube[/url]
Global mod please give me prommise to post my site link if i dont get it then please delete it
Red = Not Started Orange = Started Green = Finished
Misc
NPC Clipping - Finished Player Clipping - Finished Fillables - Finished Pickables - Finished Party Room - Started
Minigames
[img]http://www.zybez.net/img/idbimg/Cape_Saradomin.png[/img] Mage Arena http://youtu.be/HEngkEyNFng - Can only use mage - All 5 monsters - One godstaff as reward also the godcape
[img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/img2/farm_spade.gif[/img] Barrows http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d-Qpohf3VHY - All brothers - Brothers effects - Reward system - Prayer gets drained in chambers - Brothers head on screen
[img]http://www.google.nl/url?source=imglanding&ct=img&q=http://www.global-rs.com/img/tokkul.gif&sa=X&ei=PhnHTuFDh6X6BtnajSw&ved=0CAsQ8wc&usg=AFQjCNEAzGh7gjeWzNDnti4k33ag6FwdXA[/img] Fight Pits http://youtu.be/A8lxGDprcHU - Tokkuls as reward amount depends on combat level - Champion for one round - NPC shouting the current champion
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101028210760/runescape/images/d/d0/Fire_cape.PNG[/img] Fight Caves - Complete 32 Waves of Tzhaar Fight Caves - Jad with the right attack - Healers when jad is on half HP - Fire cape and tokkuls as reward
Bosses
[img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/images/misc/Armadyl_hilt.gif[/img] Godwars - Bandos and his minions - Bandos Killcount - Zamorak and his minions - Zamorak Killcount - Saradomin and her minions - Saradomin Killcount - Armadyl and his minions - Armadyl Killcount
[img]http://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQdMfuhzUcMXHxBp5UPTO1wTihnhERexJ_QWnFhdjmfapWMaB9uZciFxzw[/img] Kalphite Queen - Mage and Range attacks - First and Second form - Only attackable with full verac
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2mnfaqe.png[/img] Barrelchest - Melee/Range attack - Reduce your prayer with every hit - Random recude your defence
Skills
For gifs of the skills please visit this link: http://runeevolution.com/gif/ Done it like this cuz all the gifs made the page load realy slow for me
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l7yce3ac/Agility_icon.png[/img] Agility - Fully gnome course - Barbarian course - Wilderness course - Realistic XP - Handy shortcuts through the game
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l83b04ro/Cooking_icon.png[/img] Cooking - All fished fish can be cooked - Burning system - Potato creating - Cooking gauntlets - Decent XP
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l86m2tr8/Firemaking_icon.png[/img] Firemaking - Burn every log - Clipped lighting - Lighting to the west - Becomes ashes
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l89x5iqs/Fletching_icon.png[/img] Fletching - Fletch every bow - Fletch every arrow/bolt - Realistic Xp
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l8lhwy78/Runecrafting_icon.png[/img] Runecrafting - Every rune can be crafted - Fully working pouches
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l8s42c6c/Smithing_icon.png[/img] Smithing - Smith everything - Smelting - Iron 50% failing change [Stops after 50+ smithing or wearing ring of forging
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l8vf515w/Thieving_icon.png[/img] Thieving - Stalls disappear/respawn - Pickpocket
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l8x2odno/Crafting_icon.png[/img] Crafting - Spinning - Clothes
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l93otrms/Fishing_icon.png[/img] Fishing - Fishing guild - Right emotes - Use the right bait - Random event River Troll
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l95cd44k/Herblore_icon.png[/img] Herblore
- Creating potions - Correct Supplies, spices and ingredients - Every potion - Mixing - Emptying
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l9byii3o/Mining_icon.png[/img] Mining - Mining guild - Randomly gems - Mine everything - Rocks disappear/respawn - Random event Rock Golem
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l9f9l738/Woodcutting_icon.png[/img] Woodcutting - Cut every tree - Stumps - Random event Spirit Tree - Bird nest's [/b][/center]

so I have been hired on and I am working on the site now

Update #1 - Css skeleton made

normally dont do this …but sneak peek

Update #2 - Most of the site is now working… still working on a few parts of it. I will be in need of a banner using the pixel sizes of

Dimensions 493 × 158

and another using the pixel sizes of

Dimensions 385 × 117

I also need some images that can go on the site introduction and other parts of the site if you wish to have more information on these dimensions please let me know.
